title: Drawing, "Design for a Punch Bowl", ca. 1920–40
medium: Pen and black ink, green ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
markings: Stamp: in black ink at upper right: 227+
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and black ink at lower center: COUPE A PUNCH; at lower right: JEAN PUIFORCAT/44.
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description:
Flaring bowl with three applied bands at rim raised on an inverted flaring foot with rim. Band of another material indicated in green ink connecting bowl and foot. Central screw and plates connecting bowl and foot indicated in graphite.
Puiforcat collection contains archival photograph of punch bowl, Box 9, Folder 10 "Punch Bowl and Ladles" No #.
Puiforcat Fabrication #: 227+
